meanings.sent1: The oversophisticated design of the puzzle confused the children.
meanings.sent2: Her oversophisticated taste in art made her home look elegant.
meanings.sent3: The oversophisticated recipe called for ingredients no one had ever heard of.
meanings.sent4: His oversophisticated speech left the audience bewildered.
meanings.sent5: The oversophisticated machinery was prone to breaking down due to its intricate design.

meanings.sent1: The oversophisticated instructions for the game were hard to follow.
meanings.sent2: The oversophisticated gadget had so many buttons, it was overwhelming.
meanings.sent3: She found the oversophisticated plot of the movie more funny than thrilling.
meanings.sent4: The oversophisticated clock seemed to have a mind of its own.
meanings.sent5: The oversophisticated software kept crashing because of its overly complex code.
